name: AmongUsAutoMute (BETA)
description: Discord Bot to harness Among Us game data, and automatically mute/unmute players during the course of the game!

GALACTUS_HOST.description: The externally-accessible URL for *this* instance of the discord bot. For example, `https://<REPLACE_THIS_PART>.herokuapp.com:443`.

GALACTUS_EXTERNAL_PORT.description: The port the Bot will use for incoming Socket.io communications from the capture client. Defaults to 8123, but you must override this in Heroku to 443.

DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN.description: The Bot Token used by the bot to authenticate with Discord.

DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN_2.description: The optional second bot token used by the bot to avoid Discord API rate limiting. Recommended with large groups (8+) people to speed up muting/unmuting.

EMOJI_GUILD_ID.description: If your bot is a member of multiple guilds, this ID can be used to specify the single guild that it should use for emojis (no need to add the emojis to ALL servers).

CAPTURE_TIMEOUT.description: How many seconds of no capture events received before the Bot terminates the associated game/connection. Defaults to 600 seconds.

BOT_LANG.description: The bot localization language in Discord. By default en.
